i1.name: Staggering Blow
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Nautilus' ''' [[basic attack]]s deal {{as|{{pp|8 to 110}}|physical damage}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} and {{tip|root}} the target for {{pp|changedisplay=true|0.75 to 1.5 for 4|1 to 16}} seconds.
This effect cannot occur on the same target more than once every few seconds.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Nautilus' basic attacks deal 8undefined − 110undefined (based on level) bonus physical damage and root the target for 1 to 16 ‒ undefined seconds.
This effect cannot occur on the same target more than once every few seconds.
i1.notes:
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the {{tip|root}} but not the bonus damage.
* ''Staggering Blow's'' enhanced attack can be {{tip|blocked}} (the on-target cooldown will still be applied).
* {{Pending for test}}: ''Staggering Blow's'' interactions with {{tip|dodge|dodging}} and {{tip|blind|blinding}} effects.

e1.name: Riptide
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nautilus''' creates 3 waves of explosions that radiate from him to the surrounding area {{tt|over {{fd|0.561}} seconds|See notes}}, each dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies within and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by an amount that decays over {{fd|1.5}} seconds. ''Riptide'' deals 150% damage against {{tip|monsters}}.
Enemies hit by subsequent waves beyond the first are dealt 50% damage.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Nautilus creates 3 waves of explosions that radiate from him to the surrounding area over 0.561 seconds, each dealing magic damage to all enemies within and slowing them by an amount that decays over 1.5 seconds. Riptide deals 150% damage against monsters.
Enemies hit by subsequent waves beyond the first are dealt 50% damage.
leveling: {{st|Additional Magic Damage|{{ap|27.5|42.5|57.5|72.5|87.5}} {{as|(+ 15% AP)}}|Total Single-Target Damage|{{ap|110|170|230|290|350}} {{as|(+ 60% AP)}}}}
e1.notes:
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block a single wave.
* ''Riptide'' will cast from wherever '''Nautilus''' is at the end of the cast time.
* The first wave is centered around '''Nautilus''', while the second and third wave are centered at an offset of 25 units in front of '''Nautilus''' at the original cast location.
** Because of this, there are a zone each in which you can be hit by only 1 wave, or all 3 waves, respectively, without moving.
* The first wave happens at 0 seconds after the cast time ends, the second wave at {{fd|0.297}} seconds and the third wave at {{fd|0.561}} seconds.
** The intended timing may be {{fd|0.25}} seconds for each delay, however these are the measured, effective times.
* The ''explosions'' are only a visual effect. The first wave has 8, the seconds has 9, and the third wave has 10 explosions, equally distributed around the rings, starting with one explosion directly in '''Nautilus'''' facing direction on each.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage Per Wave: (+ 30% AP)

  • Slow:

• Additional Magic Damage: (+ 15% AP)
  • Total Single-Target Damage: (+ 60% AP)

q1.name: Dredge Line
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nautilus''' hurls his anchor forward in a line in the target direction. If it hits an enemy, it simultaneously {{tip|airborne|drags}} them towards '''Nautilus''' while he {{tip|dash|dashes}} towards them within {{fd|0.9}} seconds, during which the target is {{tip|sight|revealed}}, and dealing them {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|root|rooting}} them for {{fd|0.1}} seconds.
If the anchor hits terrain instead, '''Nautilus''' dashes to that location entirely and 50% of ''Dredge Line's'' {{sti|cooldown}} and {{sti|mana|{{as|mana cost}}}} are refunded.
'''''Nautilus''' is unable to move or attack while Dredge Line is in flight.''
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Nautilus hurls his anchor forward in a line in the target direction. If it hits an enemy, it simultaneously drags them towards Nautilus while he dashes towards them within 0.9 seconds, during which the target is revealed, and dealing them magic damage and rooting them for 0.1 seconds.
If the anchor hits terrain instead, Nautilus dashes to that location entirely and 50% of Dredge Line's cooldown and mana cost are refunded.
Nautilus is unable to move or attack while Dredge Line is in flight.
q1.notes:
* ''Dredge Line'' can interact with [[Terrain#Player-Generated|player-generated terrain]].
* '''Nautilus''' will {{tip|dash}} all the way to the target's location if ''Dredge Line'' executed them or they negated the {{tip|airborne|displacement}}.
* ''Dredge Line'' will not interrupt any movement commands '''Nautilus''' was issued pre-cast so long as their directions somewhat correlate (this is intentional to smooth out traveling/escaping).
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the ability but '''Nautilus''' will still dash partway to the target.
* The anchor projectile will stop if '''Nautilus''' dies while the projectile is traveling. Enemies hit will still be dealt damage. The {{tip|airborne|drag}} and {{tip|root}} are not applied if '''Nautilus''' did not initiate the dash.
* ''Dredge Line'' always fires from the original cast location.

w1.name: Titan's Wrath
description: While the shield holds, '''Nautilus' ''' [[basic attack]]s are empowered to afflict the target and all enemies near them with ''Pain of Wrath'', making them suffer {{as|magic damage}}, half of the damage dealt immediately and the other half dealt after {{fd|1.25}} seconds.
''Titan's Wrath'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Nautilus' ''' basic attack timer.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Nautilus shields himself for up to 6 seconds.
While the shield holds, Nautilus' basic attacks are empowered to afflict the target and all enemies near them with Pain of Wrath, making them suffer magic damage, half of the damage dealt immediately and the other half dealt after 1.25 seconds.
Titan's Wrath resets Nautilus' basic attack timer.
w1.notes:
* '''Nautilus' ''' empowered attacks use different attack animations.
** The damage over time will always apply when this animation plays (even if the shield fades during a basic attack).
* The ''Pain of Wrath'' damage over time debuff replaces itself when reapplied to the target, restarting its tick timer.
** Reapplying ''Pain of Wrath'' on a target before {{fd|1.25}} seconds prevents the second instance of damage from the previous debuff.
* ''Pain of Wrath'' does not affect structures.
* {{pending for test}}: Interaction with {{tip|dodge}}, {{tip|block}} and {{tip|blind}}.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the ability (but only a single application).
w1.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '{{tt|12|Starts on cast}}' as '12/0' and riot's value '12,12,12,12,12' as '12'

effects.str: • Bonus Magic Damage: (+ 40% AP)

r1.name: Depth Charge
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nautilus''' sends out a ''{{ai|Depth Charge 2||Depth Charge}}'' that chases the target enemy {{tip|champion}}, creating eruptions from beneath along the way and upon reaching the target, granting {{tip|sight}} of the area in each one. Enemies within the eruptions are dealt {{as|magic damage}}, {{tip|airborne|knocked up}} for 1 second, and {{tip|stun|stunned}} for a duration.
The primary target takes increased damage, is {{tip|stun|stunned}} for the same duration, and {{tip|airborne|knocked up}} for a modified duration.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Nautilus sends out a Depth Charge that chases the target enemy champion, creating eruptions from beneath along the way and upon reaching the target, granting sight of the area in each one. Enemies within the eruptions are dealt magic damage, knocked up for 1 second, and stunned for a duration.
The primary target takes increased damage, is stunned for the same duration, and knocked up for a modified duration.
leveling:
{{st|Increased Magic Damage|{{ap|150 to 400}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}}}}
{{st|Knock Up Duration|{{ap|1|1.5|2}}}}
r1.notes:
* Enemies a certain distance away from the charge / eruption are instead {{tip|airborne|knocked back}}.
* If the target dies, becomes {{tip|untargetable}}, or '''Nautilus''' loses {{tip|sight}} of them during the cast time, ''Depth Charge'' cancels but does not go on cooldown nor expend {{sti|{{as|mana}}}}.
** ''Depth Charge'' will not stop chasing if the target dies or becomes untargetable.
* {{ai|Dredge Line|Nautilus}} will not override ''Depth Charge's'' {{tip|airborne|knock up}}.
* '''Nautilus''' will {{tip|sight|reveal}} himself during the cast time.
* ''Depth Charge'' will still {{tip|stun}} enemies that are {{tip|displacement immune}}.
* ''Depth Charge'' will accelerate over time to ensure it cannot be outran (only extreme movement speed could potentially make it so).
** If the target {{tip|blink|blinks}} away at a great distance (e.g. {{si|Recall}}), the shockwave will stop its chase and erupt early. There is a range cap.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 40% AP)
